name: Mango Strawberry Mint Cumin Spiced Cooler
description: Mango strawberry mint cumin spiced cooler. Refreshing and delicious this summer drink is a great way to use up leftover fruit. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add strawberries, peeled chopped mango, mint leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt, cumin powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add strawberries, peeled chopped mango, mint leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt, cumin powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 1 whistle, or boil for 15-20 minutes until mango is soft and cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 1 whistle, or boil for 15-20 minutes until mango is soft and cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a nice sour taste).
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a nice sour taste).

recipeInstructions.text: Add more or less water according to preference. You can make this with raw fruits too!
recipeInstructions.name: Add more or less water according to preference. You can make this with raw fruits too!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled topped with fresh mint leaves!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve chilled topped with fresh mint leaves!
